review: I wanted a very simple device to use for streaming services like Netflix and Amazon Prime.  This fills the bill just perfectly for me.  It is very easy to install and set up and works just as I'd hoped.  It's small size also means it doesn't take up any extra space like a box device would.  While it hasn't been a problem for me to use, the remote is very small, which might make it a bit tricky for someone with large hands or problems with limited manual dexterity to use.

author: Derek DeJean

review: The Fire stick is just a constant ad for Amazon Prime. If you have a Prime membership, or are interested in one, then you may like this device. Since I'm not a member, and don't want to be it was incredibly annoying. So I returned it and switched it out for another Roku. Many of the apps don't work without buffering for a long time. The display is not user friendly and it's hard to find apps. The Roku has a much better, easier set up and it's not pushing a product like the Fire stick does. Spend the extra $10 and save yourself some aggravation and just get the Roku stick.
